properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 6:21AM EST until January 14 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for
the following rivers in North Carolina...

Lumber Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County

The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Lumber Near Lumberton.
* until Tuesday evening.
* At 12:40 AM Monday the stage was 12.78 feet.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this morning and continue to rise to near
13.2 feet by this evening. The river will fall below flood stage by tomorrow
morning.
* Impact...At 13.0 feet...Low land flooding will occur along the river. The flood
waters may affect some residential property as water backs up into the
drainage ditches in the city.
properties.instruction:
People with interests along the river should take the necessary precautions to
protect life and property from the flood waters.

Additional information is available on our website at weather.gov/ilm under the
"Rivers and Lakes" link.
